sentences.en: A severe flood struck the city and there was a consequent shortage of food.
sentences.cn: 该市遭到严重水灾,结果造成食物匮乏.

sentences.en: Another benefit of reducing the amount of process chemicals is the consequent lowering of production costs.
sentences.cn: 减少加工过程中化学品用量的另一好处,是可以随之降低生产费用.

sentences.en: Any consequent profit margin compression has been offset by volume gains.
sentences.cn: 销量的增长弥补了手机降价给利润率带来的压力.

sentences.en: Competition in the market has led to goods being produced cheaply and a consequent deterioration in quality.
sentences.cn: 市场上的竞争导致了商品的廉价生产,随之质量也下降了.

sentences.en: D . The consequent was too bad he could bear to see it.
sentences.cn: 球赛结果太糟了,三垒手不想看到.

sentences.en: His consequent distortion of the arrangements disturbed the German Naval Staff.
sentences.cn: 他后来对各项布置的胡乱更动,使德国海军参谋部忧心忡忡.

sentences.en: His long illness and consequent absence put him far behind in his work.
sentences.cn: 他因病缺席很久,耽误了很多课程.

sentences.en: If we got an if then statement are we asserting an antecedent, an if clause or the consequent, Q the then clause, or are we saying if P then Q.
sentences.cn: 如果我们的论述中有如果,我们在主张先行词，假设条件句或者结果，然后从句，或者我们说如果P那么。

sentences.en: Overproduction and consequent low market prices for wine caused economic tremors.
sentences.cn: 葡萄酒生产过剩及由此造成的市价低迷引起了经济波动。

sentences.en: Sedimentary loading with consequent thermal blanketing will become major factors.
sentences.cn: 随着热熄灭作用以后,沉积载荷将变成主要因素.

sentences.en: The connection between the assumption and the question or alleged consequent is remote.
sentences.cn: 这种假设与问题或被断言的结果之间远远联系不上.

sentences.en: the lowering of taxes and the consequent increase in spending
sentences.cn: 税收降低与随之引起的消费增长

sentences.en: the rise in inflation and consequent fall in demand
sentences.cn: 通货膨胀的加剧和随之而来的需求下降

sentences.en: The rise in price was consequent on the failure of the crops.
sentences.cn: 物价上涨是由年成不好引起的.

sentences.en: The warming of the Earth and the consequent climatic changes affect us all.
sentences.cn: 地球变暖以及随之而来的气候变化影响着我们所有人。

sentences.en: This fall of prices is consequent on the rise in production.
sentences.cn: 这次价格下降是生产提高的结果.

sentences.en: This is due to its inflation and consequent unemployment.
sentences.cn: 这是由通货膨胀以及随之而来的失业造成的.

words.tran_cn: 间接的；结果的；重要的；随之发生的；自傲的

trans.tran_cn: 随之发生的，必然的，合乎逻辑的，继起的，[地]顺向的，[数]后项
trans.tran_en: happening as a result of a particular event or situation
